au.com.permeance.liferay.clojure
Class ClojureScriptingCallable

java.lang.Object
  au.com.permeance.liferay.clojure.ClojureScriptingCallable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Callable<Map<String,Object>>
public class ClojureScriptingCallable
extends Object
implements Callable<Map<String,Object>>

This class wraps the clojure generated ClojureScriptable protocol and ClojureScriptableImpl implementation classes for execution of scripts from within Liferay.

Field Summary
private static au.com.permeance.liferay.clojure.ClojureScriptable CLOJURE_SCRIPTABLE
          Stores a reference to an object implementing the ClojureScriptable protocol for executing scripts.
private  Map<String,Object> inputObjects
          Stores the map of names to values of input objects, as supplied through ScriptingExecutor.eval(Set, Map, Set, String).
private static com.liferay.portal.kernel.log.Log LOG
          Stores the logger for reporting errors.
private  Set<String> outputNames
          Stores the map of names to values of output names, as supplied through ScriptingExecutor.eval(Set, Map, Set, String).
private  String script
          Stores the script to execute, as supplied through ScriptingExecutor.eval(Set, Map, Set, String).

Stores a reference to an object implementing the ClojureScriptable protocol for executing scripts.

Constructor Detail

ClojureScriptingCallable

public ClojureScriptingCallable(Map<String,Object> inputObjects,
                                Set<String> outputNames,
                                String script)
Creates a new instance of ClojureScriptingCallable, storing the supplied input objects, output names and script for use in the call() method.

Parameters:
inputObjects - a map of input names to values to expose to the script.
outputNames - a set of strings representing keys of the result map to return from call().
script - the script to execute.
Method Detail

call

public final Map<String,Object> call()
Executes the script associated with this instance, supplying the input objects and output names to the CLOJURE_SCRIPTABLE to pass onto the script.

Specified by:
call in interface Callable<Map<String,Object>>
Returns:
a map representing the result of calling the script and extracting the outputNames from its result. Note: there are no guarantees made that this map will contain any of the requested keys - that's up to the individual script to provide. However this method does ensure that any map keys which aren't in outputNames are removed.

retainKeys

protected final <K,V> Map<K,V> retainKeys(Map<K,V> map,
                                          Collection<K> keys)
This method retains the supplied keys in the supplied map - keys in the map which are missing from the set are absent from the returned map.

Type Parameters:
K - the type of keys maintained by this map
V - the type of mapped values
Parameters:
map - the map to retain keys within.
keys - the keys to retain.
Returns:
a new map containing the keys supplied.
